title: I (The Heroine) Don’t Want to be Bullied, So I’ll Help the Villainess with All My Might - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Dense Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Nobles   Oneshot   Otome Game   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 浦和篤樹
description:
Before me, a 10-year-old girl is being attacked by thugs. This is the attempted murder of Emeladia that was in the plot!

Emeladia, the Duke's daughter, would become a misanthrope because of this incident, fall and become a Villainess, and four years later, become my tormentor when I enrolled in school with her.

Yes, I am the reincarnated Heroine of this Otome Game!

Therefore, if I help, I may be able to avoid the fall of the Villainess and her bullying.

Then I've got no choice but to help!>
